text: 2nd Lancers or 2nd Lancers Regiment may refer to the following military units: *2nd Lancers (Gardner's Horse), Bengal Army, British Indian Army, and Indian Army unit *2nd Lancers Regiment of the Belgian Army, later amalgamated into the 2nd/4th Lancers Regiment *2nd Lancers Regiment (Portugal) *2nd Württemberg Uhlans, later the 20th (2nd Württemberg) Uhlans "King William I"
title: 2nd Lancers
